name: The Bag - Short Horror Game
description:
"The Bag" is a short horror video game inspired by a short film with the same name. Here is the link to the short film: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kG-2pqriOag My love for horror movies led me to develop it with the intention of bringing the idea of the short film to the interactive world of video games. As a bonus, I set myself the goal of developing it in less than 24 hours. And this was the result.


Should you open the bag or leave it closed? Are you brave enough to face what's inside? Are you ready to discover what's inside 'The Bag'? The choice is yours.
